Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Houston in 2016...
Traded from Houston to Los Angeles (A) on 2/2/2016 (Going to HOU: CF Mike Trout. Going to LAA: 2B Joe Wendle, 1B Lewin Diaz, 2B Jose Altuve)...
Injured on 6/6/2016 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Drafted in Rule 5 Draft, 1st round, by Oakland in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/22/2019, off Kent Emanuel (LAA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/28/2019, off Yordano Ventura (KC)...
Injured on 3/21/2020 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Oakland to Miami on 7/3/2020 (Going to OAK: 1B Jorge Bonifacio. Going to MIA: 2B Joe Wendle)...
Won World Series with Miami in 2023...
Drove in 7 runs against Philadelphia on 9/17/2024...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2024, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 16 RBI...
